items.title: Communications
items.summary: We help find more ways to keep you in touch with customers, and more of keeping on top what what there is to know about helping make your customers happy. With our communications platforms, we combine chat, voice, text, and websites to tie all these…
items.content_html:
We help find more ways to keep you in touch with customers, and more of keeping on top what what there is to know about helping make your customers happy.  With our communications platforms, we combine chat, voice, text, and websites to tie all these into your computers with accessing the data from your customers information telling out about past conversations, orders, and chats that they want you to have available quickly.  Make your menu system easy with customized solutions to make things fit for your business and easier for your customers.

VOIP, UCaaS, Unified Communications, Voice over IP, POTs, CRM, ERP, all these can be used to help organize a business better to help customers, vendors, and workflow of communications.

We can help get access to more options, deals, and available connections, or billing consolidations for internet services, networking, voice phones, efax, and more.

items.title: Tech Services
items.summary: Offering a wide range of services with a high emphasis or mostly based on technical, computer, automations, and business tech services. We look at your needs, requirements, and into the workflow of the processes involved so to provide a optimizations' of what we have seen…
items.content_html:
Offering a wide range of services with a high emphasis or mostly based on technical, computer, automations, and business tech services.  We look at your needs, requirements, and into the workflow of the processes involved so to provide a optimizations' of what we have seen in past, and recent research and discovery of many of todays top providers and innovators in several industries, including AI, marketing, sales, communications, internet, and connecting multiple locations with safe secure protections in place for traffic, emails, websites, and online reputation with compliance and future planning in mind.  We can help or take most of the managements of tech services role for your company or business.

Technology is ever changing in the world, we enjoy keeping informed and knowledgeable about was we can help businesses best utilize the innovations of todays top talent.  If you struggle with keeping up to date on the most effective ways to modernize your business we would enjoy to be your trusted advisor to help find solutions to the areas that would benefit the most for your company.  Contact us for technical services, computer technical support, or tech equipment advisement, consulting, and sales for software and hardware equipment computers, laptops, and tablets.  Contact Douglas PC 321-302-0036, located in just north of Titusville, in Mims, FL.
